comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw] RW - Thanks for the confirmation.  I had a thought that it might just be the NE corner because of the shadows.  Descriptions like "at the corner of X and Y street" can be in four locations,  an annoying general fault of the English language usage,  not particularly of this photo!
